SCTX - Script Source:
scn fbmwbmHircineRingScript
short Transform
float time
float newtime
ref Actor
short iswerewolf
string_var modelpath
short GetPathOnce
short attackclaws
Array_var equippeditem
short i
short attackclawsNPC
ref item
ref potentialattacker
ref crosshairRef
;short keyring
Begin OnEquip
	set Transform to 1
	set time to GameHour
	printc "equipped hircine's ring"
End

Begin GameMode
	set Actor to GetContainer
	if (GetGameLoaded)
		if(iswerewolf == 1)
			Actor.SetModelPath "Characters\_male\skeletonWerewolf.nif"
			if(Actor == Player)
				set attackclaws  to (4)*(GetGlobalValue fbmwbmclawcost)
				SetAttackDamage attackclaws fbmwbmwerewolfclawPC
				SetNumericGameSetting fActorStrengthEncumbranceMult 9999
				DisableControl 5
				DisableControl 7
				DisableControl 15
;				DisableControl 16
				DisableControl 17
				DisableControl 18
				DisableControl 19
				DisableControl 20
				DisableControl 21
				DisableControl 22
				DisableControl 23
				DisableControl 24
				DisableControl 25
				if ( Actor.IsThirdPerson )
					Actor.Update3D
				else
					ToggleFirstPerson 0
					Actor.Update3D
					ToggleFirstPerson 1
				endif
			else
				Actor.Update3D
				set attackclawsNPC  to (4)*(GetGlobalValue fbmwbmClawcostnpc)
				SetAttackDamage attackclawsNPC fbmwbmwerewolfclaw
			endif
		endif
		if(iswerewolf == 0)
			Actor.SetModelPath $modelpath
			Actor.Update3D
			if(Actor == Player)
				SetNumericGameSetting fActorStrengthEncumbranceMult oldencoumbrancesetting
				EnableControl 5
				EnableControl 7
				EnableControl 15
;				EnableControl 16
				EnableControl 17
				EnableControl 18
				EnableControl 19
				EnableControl 20
				EnableControl 21
				EnableControl 22
				EnableControl 23
				EnableControl 24
				EnableControl 25
				if ( Actor.IsThirdPerson )
					Actor.Update3D
				else
					ToggleFirstPerson 0
					Actor.Update3D
					ToggleFirstPerson 1
				endif
			endif
		endif
	endif
	if(Transform == 1)
		Print "running hircine's ring"
		if(GetPathOnce == 0)
			Let modelpath := Actor.GetModelPath
			set GetPathOnce to 1
			print"Skeleton path aquired " + modelpath
		endif
		Actor.SetModelPath "Characters\_male\skeletonWerewolf.nif"
		Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakBackward_werewolf.kf" 1
		Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakFastBackward_werewolf.kf" 1
		Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakFastForward_werewolf.kf" 1
		Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakFastLeft_werewolf.kf" 1
		Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakFastRight_werewolf.kf" 1
		Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakForward_werewolf.kf" 1
		Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakIdle_werewolf.kf" 1
		Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakLeft_werewolf.kf" 1
		Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakRight_werewolf.kf" 1
		Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakTurnLeft_werewolf.kf" 1
		Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakTurnRight_werewolf.kf" 1
		Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SwimBackward_werewolf.kf" 1
		Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SwimFastBackward_werewolf.kf" 1
		Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SwimForward_werewolf.kf" 1
		Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SwimFastForward_werewolf.kf" 1
		Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\Idle.kf" 1
		Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\OneHandEquip.kf" 1
		Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\OneHandUnequip.kf" 1
		Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakOneHandEquip.kf" 1
		Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakOneHandUnequip.kf" 1
		Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\WalkForward.kf" 1
		Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\WalkTurnLeft.kf" 1
		Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\WalkTurnRight.kf" 1
		Let equippeditem := Actor.GetEquippedItems
		Let i := 0
		if eval ((ar_Size equippeditem) > 0)
			while i < ar_Size equippeditem
				Let item := equippeditem[i]
				Actor.UnequipItemNS item
				Let i += 1
			loop				
		endif
		if(Actor == Player)
			Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\WalkFastForward_pc_werewolf.kf" 1
			set oldencoumbrancesetting to GetGameSetting fActorStrengthEncumbranceMult 
			SetNumericGameSetting fActorStrengthEncumbranceMult 9999
			Actor.AddItemNS fbmwWereBodyPC 1
			Actor.EquipItemSilent fbmwWereBodyPC
			Actor.AddItemNS fbmwWereHeadPC 1
			Actor.EquipItemSilent fbmwWereHeadPC
			Actor.AddItemNS fbmwbmwerewolfclawPC 1
			Actor.EquipItemSilent fbmwbmwerewolfclawPC
			Actor.AddItemNS fbmwbmWerewolfClawShieldPC 1
			Actor.EquipItemSilent fbmwbmWerewolfClawShieldPC
			Actor.AddSpellNs 0werewolfSregeneration
;			Actor.AddSpellNS 0werewolfSvision
			Actor.AddSpellNS 0werewolfSresists
			Actor.SetFactionRank fbmwWereFaction 0
			set iswerewolf to 1
			if ( Actor.IsThirdPerson )
				Actor.Update3D
			else
				ToggleFirstPerson 0
				Actor.Update3D
				ToggleFirstPerson 1
			endif
			set attackclaws  to (4)*(GetGlobalValue fbmwbmclawcost)
			SetAttackDamage attackclaws fbmwbmwerewolfclawPC
			DisableControl 5
			DisableControl 7
			DisableControl 15
;			DisableControl 16
			DisableControl 17
			DisableControl 18
			DisableControl 19
			DisableControl 20
			DisableControl 21
			DisableControl 22
			DisableControl 23
			DisableControl 24
			DisableControl 25
		elseif(Actor != Player)
			Print "running non player part of the script"
			Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\WalkFastForward_werewolf.kf" 1
			Actor.AddItem fbmwWereBodyNPC 1
			Actor.EquipItem fbmwWereBodyNPC 1
			Actor.AddItem fbmwWereHeadNPC 1
			Actor.EquipItem fbmwWereHeadNPC 1
			Actor.AddItem fbmwbmwerewolfclaw 1
			Actor.EquipItem fbmwbmwerewolfclaw 1
			Actor.AddItem fbmwbmWerewolfClawShield 1
			Actor.EquipItem fbmwbmWerewolfClawShield 1
			Actor.AddSpell 0werewolfSregeneration
			Actor.AddSpell 0werewolfSresists
			Actor.SetFactionRank fbmwbmWerewolfFaction 0
			Actor.Update3D
			Actor.setav aggression 100
			set attackclawsNPC  to (4)*(GetGlobalValue fbmwbmClawcostnpc)
			SetAttackDamage attackclawsNPC fbmwbmwerewolfclaw
			StartCombat Player
		Endif
		set Transform to 3
	endif
	if(Transform == 3)
		if(newtime >= (time + 6))
			set Transform to 2
		endif
		set newtime to GameHour
	endif
	if(Transform == 2)
		if(Actor == Player)
			Actor.RemoveItemNS fbmwWereBodyPC 1
			Actor.RemoveItemNS fbmwWereHeadPC 1
			Actor.RemoveItemNS fbmwbmWerewolfClawShieldPC 1
			Actor.RemoveItemNS fbmwbmwerewolfclawPC 1
			Actor.RemoveSpellNS 0werewolfSregeneration
;			Actor.RemoveSpellNS 0werewolfSvision
			Actor.RemoveSpellNS 0werewolfSresists
			Actor.SetFactionRank fbmwWereFaction -1
			SetNumericGameSetting fActorStrengthEncumbranceMult oldencoumbrancesetting
;			Let keyring := ar_Find fbmwBMringhircine equippeditem ; Avoid player reequip the ring of hircine
;			if (keyring != 0)
;				ar_Erase equippeditem keyring
:			endif
			Let i := 0
			if eval ((ar_Size equippeditem) > 0)
				while i < ar_Size equippeditem
					Let item := equippeditem[i]
					Actor.EquipItem2NS item
					Let i += 1
				loop				
			endif
			Let equippeditem  := ar_Null
			Actor.SetModelPath $modelpath 
			Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakBackward_werewolf.kf" 0
			Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakFastBackward_werewolf.kf" 0
			Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakFastForward_werewolf.kf" 0
			Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakFastLeft_werewolf.kf" 0
			Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakFastRight_werewolf.kf" 0
			Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakForward_werewolf.kf" 0
			Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakIdle_werewolf.kf" 0
			Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakLeft_werewolf.kf" 0
			Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakRight_werewolf.kf" 0
			Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakTurnLeft_werewolf.kf" 0
			Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakTurnRight_werewolf.kf" 0
			Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SwimBackward_werewolf.kf" 0
			Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SwimFastBackward_werewolf.kf" 0
			Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SwimForward_werewolf.kf" 0
			Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SwimFastForward_werewolf.kf" 0
			Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\Idle.kf" 0
			Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\OneHandEquip.kf" 0
			Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\OneHandUnequip.kf" 0
			Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakOneHandEquip.kf" 0
			Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\SneakOneHandUnequip.kf" 0
			Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\WalkForward.kf" 0
			Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\WalkTurnLeft.kf" 0
			Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\WalkTurnRight.kf" 0
			Actor.ToggleSpecialAnim "CurseOfHircine\WalkFastForward_pc_werewolf.kf" 0
			EnableControl 5
			EnableControl 7
			EnableControl 15
;			EnableControl 16
			EnableControl 17
			EnableControl 18
			EnableControl 19
			EnableControl 20
			EnableControl 21
			EnableControl 22
			EnableControl 23
			EnableControl 24
			EnableControl 25
			if ( Actor.IsThirdPerson )
				Actor.Update3D
			else
				ToggleFirstPerson 0
				Actor.Update3D
				ToggleFirstPerson 1
			endif
			set iswerewolf to 0
			set time to 0
			set newtime to 0
			set Transform to 0
		endif
	endif
	if(Actor == Player)
		if(iswerewolf == 1)
			Let crosshairRef := GetCrosshairRef
			if(crosshairRef.IsDoor == 1)&&(crosshairRef.GetLocked == 0);To avoid being blocked in an interior.
				EnableControl 5
			else
				DisableControl 5
			endif
		endif
		if (iswerewolf==1) ;experimental fix for combat
			Let potentialattacker := GetFirstRef 35  
			while (potentialattacker)
				if(potentialattacker.GetIsCreature != 1)&&(potentialattacker.GetDead == 0)  ; to avoid permanent detection values to dead npcs
					if(potentialattacker.GetDetectionLevel Player == 3)&&(potentialattacker.GetInFaction fbmwbmWerewolfFaction == 0) ; so they will attack only when they "see" you
						if(potentialattacker.GetActorValue Aggression >= potentialattacker.GetDisposition Player); to avoid being attacked by non morroblivion npcs
							potentialattacker.StartCombat Player
						endif
					endif
				endif	
				Let potentialattacker := GetNextRef
			loop
		endif  ; End experiment
	endif
End
Begin MenuMode 1002
	if(iswerewolf == 1)	
		CloseAllMenus
	endif
End
Begin MenuMode 1003
	if(iswerewolf == 1)	
		CloseAllMenus
	endif
End
Begin MenuMode 1022
	if(iswerewolf == 1)	
		CloseAllMenus
	endif
End
Begin MenuMode 1023
	if(iswerewolf == 1)	
		CloseAllMenus
	endif
End




;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 27 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
